text: Ben Affleck ’ s birthday was a family affair! The actor turned 45 on Tuesday, August 15, and celebrated with his three kids. The Batman actor enjoyed dinner with Violet, 11, Seraphina, 8, and Samuel, 5, whom he shares with estranged wife Jennifer Garner, at Barton G restaurant in West Hollywood. Affleck was seen arriving at the hot spot in a T - shirt, gray blazer, jeans and gray sneakers. “ He was having fun spending quality time with [ the kids ], ” an eyewitness tells Us Weekly.
